text: The 2018 Formula One World Championship is the 69th season of the Formula One World Championship. The motor racing championship is the highest class of competition for open-wheel racing cars. The 2018 season started with the Australian Grand Prix on March 25 2018, and ended with Abu Dhabi Grand Prix on November 25 2018. == Grands Prix winners == Rnd Race Track Driver Constructor 1 Rolex Australian Grand Prix Melbourne Grand Prix Circuit Sebastian Vettel Ferrari 2 Gulf Air Bahrain Grand Prix Bahrain International Circuit Sebastian Vettel Ferrari 3 Heineken Chinese Grand Prix Shanghai International Circuit Daniel Ricciardo Red Bull-TAG Heuer 4 Azerbaijan Grand Prix Baku City Circuit Lewis Hamilton Mercedes 5 Gran Premio de España Emirates Circuit de Barcelona- Catalunya Lewis Hamilton Mercedes 6 Grand Prix de Monaco Circuit de Monaco Daniel Ricciardo Red Bull-TAG Heuer 7 Heineken Grand Prix du Canada Circuit Gilles Villeneuve Sebastian Vettel Ferrari 8 Pirelli Grand Prix de France Circuit Paul Ricard Lewis Hamilton Mercedes 9 Eyetime Großer Preis von Österreich Red Bull Ring Max Verstappen Red Bull-TAG Heuer 10 Rolex British Grand Prix Silverstone Circuit Sebastian Vettel Ferrari 11 Emirates Großer Preis von Deutschland Hockenheimring Lewis Hamilton Mercedes 12 Magyar Nagydíj Hungaroring Lewis Hamilton Mercedes 13 Belgian Grand Prix Circuit de Spa- Francorchamps Sebastian Vettel Ferrari 14 Gran Premio Heineken d'Italia Autodromo Nazionale di Monza Lewis Hamilton Mercedes 15 Sinapore Airlines Singapore Grand Prix Marina Bay Street Circuit Lewis Hamilton Mercedes 16 VTB Russian Grand Prix Sochi Autodrom Lewis Hamilton Mercedes 17 Honda Japanese Grand Prix Suzuka International Racing Course Lewis Hamilton Mercedes 18 Pirelli United States Grand Prix Circuit of the Americas Kimi Räikkönen Ferrari 19 Gran Premio de México Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez Max Verstappen Red Bull-TAG Heuer 20 Grande Prêmio do Brasil Autódromo José Carlos Pace Lewis Hamilton Mercedes 21 Etihad Airways Abu Dhabi Grand Prix Yas Marina Circuit Lewis Hamilton Mercedes Category:2018 in sports Category:Formula One seasons
